layout.name: indices
layout.title: Partner Indices
layout.tooltip: Determines which blocks to connect the electricity to when this block gets activated.

layout.name: startActive
layout.title: Start Active
layout.tooltip: If true, the block will be activated automatically.

layout.name: indicesToTrigger
layout.title: Indices To Trigger
layout.tooltip: Determines which blocks to trigger when this block gets activated.

layout.name: triggerDelay
layout.title: Trigger Delay
layout.tooltip: After how many frames will the block trigger the blocks of given indices.
